snippet: Data showed that the schools were violating requirements on bilingual education, and that in 2010 those students had an on-time-graduation rate of only 7 percent.
lead_paragraph: Data showed that the schools were violating requirements on bilingual education, and that in 2010 those students had an on-time-graduation rate of only 7 percent.

headline.main: State Puts Pressure on City Schools Over English Language Learners
headline.print_headline: State Puts Pressure on City Schools Over English Language Learners
headline.seo: N.Y. State Presses City on English Language Learners
